title: INetFwProfile::put_UnicastResponsesToMulticastBroadcastDisabled (netfw.h)
description: Indicates whether the firewall should not allow unicast responses to multicast and broadcast traffic. (INetFwProfile.put_UnicastResponsesToMulticastBroadcastDisabled)
